PageWidgetPortable.Title: Documentos gerados
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_CN_MODELOS_DOCUMENTOS_GERADOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>5</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>((A.CONTRATO = @RASTRO(CN_CONTRATOS) AND @RASTRO(CN_CONTRATOADITIVOS) = -1) OR (@RASTRO(CN_CONTRATOS) > 0 AND @RASTRO(CN_CONTRATOADITIVOS) = A.ADITIVO)) AND A.DOCUMENTO IS NOT NULL</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/contratos/documentos/detalhesEmissao.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
